title: Smart Data Models - GovSteamCC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Cross compound turbine governor model.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovSteamCC

dhp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. HP damping factor (Dhp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

dlp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. LP damping factor (Dlp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

fhp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of HP power ahead of reheater (Fhp).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

flp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of LP power ahead of reheater (Flp).  Typical Value = 0.7. Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

pmaxhp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum HP value position (Pmaxhp).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

pmaxlp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum LP value position (Pmaxlp).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

rhp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. HP governor droop (Rhp).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

rlp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. LP governor droop (Rlp).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

t1hp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. HP governor time constant (T1hp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

t1lp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. LP governor time constant (T1lp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

t3hp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. HP turbine time constant (T3hp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

t3lp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. LP turbine time constant (T3lp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

t4hp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. HP turbine time constant (T4hp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

t4lp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. LP turbine time constant (T4lp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

t5hp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. HP reheater time constant (T5hp).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

t5lp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. LP reheater time constant (T5lp).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0
